allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add WinXP WebOS portfolio design document

Complete design specification for Windows XP-style web OS portfolio including:
- Boot sequence and desktop layout
- Window management system
- Portfolio apps \(IE, Terminal, Wallet, Neural Viewer, Outlook styles\)
- Utility apps \(Minesweeper, Notepad, Explorer\)
- Audio system and context menus
- Easter eggs and hidden content

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: add comprehensive implementation plan for WinXP WebOS

21 tasks covering:
- Project setup with Next.js, Zustand, Howler.js
- Boot sequence \(BIOS, loading, welcome\)
- Desktop with icons and wallpaper
- Window system \(drag, resize, z-index\)
- Taskbar with start menu
- Portfolio apps \(IE, Terminal, Wallet, Neural, Outlook\)
- Utilities \(Notepad, Minesweeper, Explorer\)
- Context menu and audio system

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(git -C /Users/ashraf.beshtawi/Desktop/WinXp add public/img/frontend.svg public/img/backend.svg public/img/web3.svg public/img/ai.svg public/img/me.svg)

Bash(git -C /Users/ashraf.beshtawi/Desktop/WinXp commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: add portfolio placeholder SVG images

Add themed SVG placeholder images for portfolio app windows:
- frontend.svg: Browser window with code and 3D cube icon
- backend.svg: Server rack with terminal and database
- web3.svg: Blockchain blocks with Ethereum logo and wallet
- ai.svg: Neural network visualization with connected nodes
- me.svg: Professional profile avatar placeholder

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
